title: Northern Ireland Housing Statistics
description:
The Northern Ireland Housing Statistics report is an annual compendium of statistics containing information on a range of areas relating to housing.
The report is divided into sections covering: supply, energy, social renting demand, private renting demand, owner occupier demand and household characteristics.
datasetNotes: Data on this page identified as latest version via link entitled "Northern Ireland Housing Statistics [year]" towards top part of page under heading "Northern Ireland Housing Statistics report". This opens a new page with a series of six spreadsheets under the heading "Documents" entitled "Northern Ireland Housing Statistics [year]" labelled Section 1 to Section 6. Homelessness data contained in table of Section 3, tab T3_8 to T3_11.
sizingNotes: 12 tables with different aspects.  needs some up front work to determine how to handle the dimensions / split into datasets.  Should be straightforward to extract data. Homelessness data contained in table of Section 3, tabs T3_8 to T3_11 but seems to be purely a summary of data contained in the "Northern Ireland homelessness bulletin" dataset (see below).
notes: The Homelessness element of this data set seems to be purely a summary of data contained in the "Northern Ireland homelessness bulletin" data set (see below).
